body: Now this is the kind of mc i can be proud. A literal chad. Studied hard and even protected his sensei instead of acting like a wimp

@troncol who are you talking about again? this artists is the same as rest of the those sadistic motherfuckers who make netorare rape etc,
none of these sick minded bastards should get credits or anything.

You've got to give this guy credit for making this series vanilla despite the seriously NTR-like setting... The MC actually paid attention in class, studied hard, aced the test, stood up to his bully and then proceeded to knock him the f*ck out when it came time to protect his love interest. Sweet!
